suncertify.gui.server
Class ServerConfigurationPanel

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.gui.server.ServerConfigurationPanel

 class ServerConfigurationPanel
extends java.lang.Object

The JPanel that contains the JTextFields for the database location, RMI hostname and RMI port which are used by the server GUI.

Since:
29/04/2014
Author:
Luke GJ Potter

areTextFieldValuesValid

public boolean areTextFieldValuesValid()
Ensures that the values in the ServerConfigurationPanel's JTextFields are valid values. This method examines if the database file exists in the location specified.

Returns:
True, if the values are valid. False, if the values are invalid.

disableAllFields

public void disableAllFields()
Disables all the ServerConfigurationPanel's JTextFields, so they cannot be edited.
